website_summaries.verdict: With too many better brewers out there in the same price range, it’s hard to recommend the Keurig K75 Platinum.
pros: Keurig makes it easy to brew a quick cup of coffee with the K75
cons: We found the K75's brew bitter-tasting and watery compared with its competition

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine until it dies on you
customer_reviews.text: I drink coffee every single morning. I have a single cup every single morning. I hate brewing coffee. Keurigs are basically made for my exact use case. I LOVE my Keurig. I HATE how often they break. This model is one of the worst I have used in terms of reliability. Unfortunately it broke right after I was out of the return period through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: We replaced our Mr. Coffee brand
customer_reviews.text: We love this one. Our Mr. Coffee brand pot leaked terribly, and it took much longer to warm up and make a cup. It was also not programmable. This one is programmable, heats up quickly, and pours out then stops so I can remove my cup without having drips to clean up. It also hold a lot of water so I am not constantly refilling the tank. I would buy this one again. I know that if it is like our last Keurig it will only last a couple of years, but the features are so much better that unless others improve, I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Khandi Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love it! I had the B30 brewer before this which served me dutifully for years. With the coming Keurig 2.0 though I've been getting nervous about being unable to get the old style brewers anymore if the old one broke. I also was excited by taking a step up in capabilities. I'm totally thrilled with this unit. It brews in a fraction of the time of my old unit, has a bunch of nice power saving features, and has some features like cup size that I sorely missed in the old one. I can't complain, I'm one happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Loadnabox

customer_reviews.title: worked great...for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until it broke last week. Will only fill cup 1-2 inches, makes terrible noise and have take out and reinsert the water container just to get that. Pretty much dead now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: First off I am coffee particular. So I didn't think that I would ever benefit from the use of a Keurig but I was so sad about it because I am the only coffee drinker and I am smitten with the function and purpose of the Keurig. My favorite coffee is from a locally made coffee company. They have the best coffee that I have ever tasted. I was looking into smaller one cup coffee makers and came across the reusable coffee K-cups and was so excited. To have the ease, simplicity, and options that Keurig offers with my favorite coffee? Its a match made in coffee heaven.
customer_reviews.author: SevenSwansASwimming

customer_reviews.title: Glad I pain a bit more for a quality machine.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this model from a cheaper one that didn't have brew-strength adjust, and I am very pleased with its design, construction, and ease of operation. The K-cup concept is truly and advance over other methods of making coffee and tea, and I find myself enjoying more healthful green tay during the daytime simply because it's so easy to brew. If the device has been turned off, it does tai a couple of minutes to heat up the water, but I find this to be a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Nelson MD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Even using pre-filtered water after almost 4 yrs it has begun having trouble. Use it to make 1-2 cups 3-4 times a week, should last a lot longer with only being used a few times a week. So I wonder if it's really worth it??? I've cleaned by using their cleaning descaling and filters, but like said we only use filter water. So don't know???
customer_reviews.author: B. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Keurig system upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Keurig coffee maker. The first one served us for 3 years without a problem. But all good things must come to an end and we didn't give any other brand a thought. These pots are very reliable and make great coffee. We love the variety of coffees and drinks available to us using the Kcups and the convenience of making single cups and not a whole pot. We also like the feature of the filter in this model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Must have for coffee lovers !
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Bought it for my boo and he just loved it. And even when it’s not in use it’s not bad to look at in the kitchen . Fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Vac

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This machine replaces a Keurig that had no water reservoir. This K45 has an option for cup size and a water filter, faster brew times, dispenses a hotter beverage with better flavor, and thus is a substantial improvement over my old bare-bones model. The old one was very reliable however, took up less space, and seemed more well made (I'm keeping it for an emergency). Hopefully the new one will live up to the old one's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Monaco 535

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Small Appliance
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee, and I consider myself somewhat of a coffee snob. I have spent hundreds of dollars looking to make good coffee at home (espresso makers and coffee systems), and so far, this is on the only product I have liked. The temperature is just right, and the flavor is robust in each cup. I use it 5-6 times daily. I have sampled several different coffee brands, and each one tastes better than any cup I have ever been able to make before this machine. My wife, who doesn't drink coffee, also loves it for teas, hot cocoa, and convenience hot water. I have bought two more of these to give has gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Derek A Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Love love love I use it ever day sometimes several ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love I use it ever day sometimes several times, used for coffee and tea. Can make several cups without refilling. Great flow, easy to clean, makes smooth hot delicious coffee, and the convenient menu options let me have it on and warming water when I'm ready and auto shut off when I'm done, no waiting and no waste. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Heavily used
customer_reviews.text: This Keurig model is very easy to use, has minimal cleaning, and can provide single cups of coffee, hot chocolate, tea, or apple cider within 4 minutes of turning it on to warm up. Flavors aren't quite as strong as traditional pots of coffee as of early 2013 but if you stick to brands like Eight O'clock for K Cups, you'll be very happy with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Geber

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked 13 months and malfuncted. One month out of warranty. Gum smacking customer support only wanted to focus on descaling. Machine like new when dissembled. Pro's: Contacted company again and informed them of poor customer service and prior reviews warned of machines not holding up replaced it free.
customer_reviews.author: feelsright

customer_reviews.title: Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and I was thrilled. I have one of the original ones and getting is like getting the Caddy of coffee makers. I used it, set it up and it was very easy. I love all of the different cup sizes. Arrived well packed and in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Andrecola

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a broken Keurig.....
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a broken Keurig..... Even when selected a large cup of coffee, it only will spit out a few drops of water. I tried cleaning it with vinegar, and it still does not work. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Had before and liked. Went out on us
customer_reviews.text: Had before and liked. Went out on us, so got the new one which was returned as the choice is cup size is limited and at times it simply did not work. Now back to premier K75 which is just fine with us.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: MMMM Coffee....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my early Mother's Day gift... I've always wanted one... I failed to read all the details and didn't realize it came with 60 K Cups... I was so excited trying to find places to put all my new coffee!! It was very well packaged and came quickly... even my husband likes to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Troyer

customer_reviews.title: great product, had a year and it is still ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, had a year and it is still going strong, I bought cups to use myown grounds and it is a feel good thing not to have to throw out a plastic cup in the trash
customer_reviews.author: geodon

customer_reviews.title: Go Platinum!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my son and he loved it. The pluses are the water reservoir and the 5 cup sizes. Finally decided to buy one for our home and we are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: finney

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: Real good for easy and quick brewing of 1 cup of coffee at a time. However you have to rinse out with vinegar a couple of times because if you don't the coffee tastes like hot chlorinated water
customer_reviews.author: Wizard3534

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small office of about 6 people, and we have outside corporate folks & vendors that stop in for meetings now and then. This is the perfect machine. When you first get it you'll want to mess around and get the right coffee cup height for your mugs or cups if in an office if that's where you are using it. The programming was easy. One thing to note, while getting it started fill the H2O tank at least 1/2 way with H2O. This was different than my single serve at home; once I did that I was able to move forward with brewing and programming. Great product, and it came with TONS of samples!
customer_reviews.author: wlynns

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: First time using a K-Cup brewer but am getting used to the new system and really like it! I only gave this 4 stars because, like other reviewers, about a week after starting to use this product we kept getting the "prime" notification. Usually just needed to rinse out the water reservoir real quick and it would go away. Then all of a sudden it stopped doing that and works perfectly fine... weird. Finger crossed that we keep having good luck! Overall have enjoyed our new system!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Dehlin

customer_reviews.title: less than stellar
customer_reviews.text: The item I purchased was nonfunctional. Experiencing problems returning the item to the seller. Wish it would have been functional, after reading the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: 2RBLE

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps telling us Prime on the window. I never got that message on my first one = exact same model which is why I bought another one like it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hz

customer_reviews.title: Excited but Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker arrived without the 12 kcups (which I don't really care about) or water filter (which is needed to even operate the machine!
customer_reviews.author: bbhenry21

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, while it works. It'll crap out on you after about 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not Be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my office! Everyone LOVES IT... super easy to use; attractive in our newly remodeled kitchen, reservoir holds quite a bit of water so less "maintenance" for me, option of cup size (will even fit a tall to-go mug!!), and the best thing of all... I don't have to make coffee for anyone anymore - self-serve is a beautiful thing!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Fults

customer_reviews.title: Great Keurig K75
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife first single cup brewing system. My wife love it, we get a chance to try all types of coffee together. it was giving to her for Christmas. The setup was very ease and the 14 illustrated steps are perfectly presented. The clean up is a brezzzz and adding the water is a piece of cake. In a nut shell my wife and I love this brewing system, very, very satisfied. Its easy to use, brew quickly. Does what you expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Why have we waited so long to purchase this!
customer_reviews.text: The brewing is done in a timely fashion. Flavors available for brewing are great and numerous. Easy to use. Easy to load, brew, refill water. The whole family enjoys it including my husband who chooses to scope his own coffee for brewing using the individual filter.
customer_reviews.author: tbb1998

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase this month!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a welcome addition to the house since having a baby and needing a strong cup of coffee pronto!!
customer_reviews.author: Woobie Maui Wasabi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would enjoy having this kind of a coffee pot, but is wonderful not to have to deal with paper filters and waiting for coffee to brew. Just put in the pod and coffee is ready. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie Vitorelo

customer_reviews.title: Works great but then a few weeks later they came out ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it to replace a K70 that stopped working. Works great but then a few weeks later they came out with a 2.0 model.
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son for college. Him and his room mate are loving it! I will be ordering a lot more K-Cups in the furure I can see.
customer_reviews.author: jman57

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brewer. This is the first machine I have purchased after extensive research. Not only is the unit functional but it is also gorgeous. All black with the blue lighting in the reservoir and the buttons is wonderful. It was easy to set up and is easy to use. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: themotherchef

customer_reviews.title: Great Cup of Joe
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this product, wright out of the box easy set up and usage, not to mention a great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.author: Guster

customer_reviews.title: another one bites the dust
customer_reviews.text: Am done with this brand.....not even a year old and quit........
customer_reviews.author: Lorita

customer_reviews.title: Love My Keurig!
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller keurig and it stopped working. So I decided to go bigger. Best details decision so far
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome system
customer_reviews.text: I had spent a week with my kids and used theirs. That was it - I had to have one! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow - this thing works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a present for my wife, and she loves it. It makes good coffee quickly and with no mess (as long as you use the prepackaged K-cups). The only downside is that using your own coffee is messy; the prepackaged stuff, given that it's single-serving, is perforce pricey, on the order of $1/cup. Of course, that's still cheaper than Starbuck's, and you don't have to go out in the rain first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Another Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: works great thanks. i made 40 cups of coffee wonderful ...
customer_reviews.text: works great thanks . i made 40 cups of coffee wonderful thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my husband. It was a hit! His eyes sparkled when he opened it and was like a little kid at Christmas time! I chose the larger capacity so it would be more convenient to use instead of the smaller version where we would need to keep refilling the water storage. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make strong enough coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Keurig when my espresso machine broke, but have not been impressed. I have tried several different strong coffees in the machine, but cannot get a strong enough brew. I have had to resort to brewing the same K-cup twice at the minimum 4oz serving size to get an okay cup.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Keables

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this brewer to replace a prior version that we had for years. We are very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this K75 Model from Keurig.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Keurig and I absolutely love this model. I actually bought this just to have on hand in case my 4 year old Keurig breaks down. Don't want to ever go a day without my Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved it! As it was her Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Angela E Reyes

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Amazon fan and use them frequently but this is the first time I bought something from the "return" warehouse and it will probably be the last. The packaging was damaged and the Keurig would not even power up. My guess is, someone returned it broken. Normally, this is a fantastic coffee maker and I would recommend it, just not this way. As usual, Amazon service was a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker for me kids who drink coffee and they all love it. It gets used every day and I haven't heard one complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Keurig
customer_reviews.text: We bought for the office and every loves it! We like being able to adjust the size of cup you want.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: The King of Keurigs! nice product for the price. upscale model. would recommend to anyone who uses a coffee machine a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Queeno

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Came faster than expected, had my last one for 4 years and it finally stopped working! This one is even nicer than the first. Has more options for cup size! Awwwwh coffee in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Pedus

customer_reviews.title: Not a big coffee drinker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot. I am not a big coffee drinker mostly when its cold or its a lagging kinda morning. Love being able to only make one cup rather than a whole pot and wasting the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Carman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Many uses during the day....morning coffee, afternoon tea or coffee (oatmeal), late night teas...it's great. Almost like an instant hot water spout!
customer_reviews.author: Dbuddha

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Now with several untis at home and office these units contue to impress - easy to use , great coffee
customer_reviews.author: Larry W Hotaling

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Brewing System
customer_reviews.text: The Keurig K75 Brewing system is easy to operate. It makes great coffee and tea. I highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my son; the whole family sampled quick, hot cups of coffee and hot cocoa all day!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very substantial has a nice heft has a well built clasp looks great too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need. Lot's of brew size options. Large water container. Space efficient. Quiet and looks good. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: David DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: quick & easy. Coffee is a little more expensive but worth it. Also hard to find a variety of K-cup flavors in the stores. Sticking to ordering them online.
customer_reviews.author: chris carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Keurig K-75
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my mother and she cannot stop raving about it. It fits her and my father to a tee and its is simplistic enough that even he can use it.
customer_reviews.author: james vaughn jr.

customer_reviews.title: Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Makes one of the best cups of coffee. However the pods are a little expensive and sometimes hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie white

customer_reviews.title: dont know what you wants here
customer_reviews.text: It's great when using the k-cups but not real happy when using the reusable coffee filter it leaks and makes a mess
customer_reviews.author: Wilma J Mount

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. Make great coffee in minutes. Like that you can choose 5 cup sizes. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhenda L. Varnadoe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: product cheaply made and made coffee taste poorly. returned product for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ford

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing in my kitchen! Best gift I could have ever gotten. Super easy to use. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily, simple to use. Worth the extra money vs the other version because of the large water take, and multiple cup sizes... Sure do wish there was a strength switch because I swear each cup I make taste different... But still taste awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: as per normal a great coffee maker from keurig. got 3 solid months out of this so far and still working like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: swampdonkey

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I order
customer_reviews.text: I love the Keurig! However, I ordered the all black one and got the black and silver one. I was disappointed, but none the less it still done the job.
customer_reviews.author: roxygirl

customer_reviews.title: broke again
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be one of the best coffee makers bought. different and more expensive then my last keurig. One week, same issue More successs with mr. coffee.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Item shipped was marked as Display Model on box and ...
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped was marked as Display Model on box and had clearly been opened. Also did not contain sample cups as described.
customer_reviews.author: JMan

customer_reviews.title: Not as adverstised
customer_reviews.text: This Item is not Midnight Black. It is the Standard Platinum color model. It does come with a K-cup accessory to use your own coffee plus some k-cups.
customer_reviews.author: John C Volk II

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2013 still using in 2019!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little machine back in 2013 and its November 2019 and I just made my daily cup of morning coffee with it!! The display everything working still. We use it every day. Our machine has been a primary piece of kitchen equipment..for 7 years. I hate to jinx it but I just had to leave a comment on a product that we've enjoyed for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Mexicoconut

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This Keurig is absolutely great! Consistently good coffee. But there are some features on this machine that really make it worth the price. First of all you can program the time it will turn on and off each day. Second, you can choose the amount of water you will be brewing, allowing larger and weaker coffee, or smaller and stronger coffee. Ideal for houses with different strength preferences. Third, and in my opinion the best feature, is the almost instant brewing after the initial warm up. With automatic on and off time set every day, I no longer ever have to wait to brew. If it breaks tomorrow, the next one will be ordered the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeholic

customer_reviews.title: "Prime" error when new
customer_reviews.text: Every two cups it gives a "prime" error and you have to reseat the water tank. This started after only 2 weeks of occasional use. Common problem but really they need to fix it. Coffee is pretty good though. Update- Reseating the tank a few times fixes the prime error. It did this very often a few weeks after I bought it, but then it started working very well. Break-in period maybe? Anyway it's been quite a few months since I wrote this review, and it hasn't given the error anymore. Adding a star to the review.
customer_reviews.author: Gigs

customer_reviews.title: A Great Replacement for my previous Keurig
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coffee maker after reading good reviews at various sites. It has performed wonderfully. I love the extra small setting for instant oatmeal in the morning. My previous Keurig only had 3 cup size settings, none of which were right for my oatmeal. Now I prepare my oatmeal, change the cup size and make my morning coffee. By the time my coffee is made, I can sit and enjoy my breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Unett

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade was worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loves it. Was an upgrade from his single serve. Loves the tank and the different cup sizes. Likes the blue light that lights up the tank. Easy turn off switch so you don't have to leave it on when not in use. Bought this one so that he wasn't limited to only k cups like the newer ones. You can still use tea bags or if you want loose coffee and other brands. Has been using it everyday for two months so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: If nothing else it's convenient
customer_reviews.text: Does it make great coffee? No. It does however make good coffee and it makes it quick. I use it weekday mornings when I just need a quick cup on the way out of the house. For simply, cleanly and quickly making one cup it can't be beat. The coffee you use is of course important and you need to go more bold than you normally would. For the weekends nothing will ever replace my aero-press but nothing beats this for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Scholtz

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing 💕
customer_reviews.text: This was probably hands down the best purchase I have made here on Amazon. I got this for my hubby's birthday. He was such an excited guy on his birthday. To have that kind of joy from something so simple was a pleasure to witness. Thanks Amazon for making that happen! Still using it everyday. Gotta clean it out every once in a while with just plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasia Baker

customer_reviews.title: Keurig K75 Single-Cup Home-Brewing System with Water Filter Kit,...
customer_reviews.text: My mother (age 93) and I love our Keurig!!! My father (age 91), at first wanted to send it back because he was used to using a coffee pot. Now, he loves the Keurig!!! Old ways die hard - ha, ha! I would recommend the Keurig K75 to everyone! I purchased the K75 because of the removable water container & filter system.
customer_reviews.author: Candace S. Campise

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Keurig, and we absolutely love it!! It's wonderful being able to get a fresh, hot, cup of coffee at any time. Yes, it's a little more expensive than regular ground coffee in a drip maker, but no more pouring out cold coffee that's gone bitter, and waiting for the pot to brew, etc. Really nice for drop-in company, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Water tank doesn't sit correctly. Randomly stops detecting the water tank is connected, so it will just blink lights and not work. Too late to return it. Going in the trash and have to buy a competitor's product. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very apprehensive to purchase a coffee maker that costs so much, but after the firehouse purchased one and it was able to take the constant abuse without breaking, I knew it would last forever. Get one, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a known product
customer_reviews.text: Decided to stick with what had worked for the last 3 years so I ordered another K75. The 2.0 models did not have very good reviews and I did not want to brew a carafe. In the words of the late University of Texas Coach Darrel Royal "dance with what brung you"..
customer_reviews.author: Bob Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Fiancee LOVES this thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my fiancee and am please to say that she uses it almost everyday and is still very much in love with this machine. We love that it has 5 different size settings, is easy to use & setup and that the water tank is easily removed to clean or add/drain out water.
customer_reviews.author: Bo @WonderousReads

customer_reviews.title: Life is good
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. My morning routine is so simple now and no nasty coffee pot to clean later. And if my husband doesn't want the same kind of coffee as I do, it's not a problem anymore. Works great everytime, I have had no issues whatsoever and would recommend this machine to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this Keurig K75
customer_reviews.text: Love this Keurig K75. I'm saving on coffee by not wasting half a pot of regular coffee. Took me a long time to decide to buy one,, but am very very pleased with the purchase. And Amazon had it on my doorstep in no time. Thanks for the pleasure of a FRESH cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Lee A Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Effortless
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use. Initial setup took approx 20 minutes, most of that time was spent reading the instructions. Once set-up it is as simple as placing your mug, inserting a k-cup and pressing a button. Almost no cleanup- just throw away the used k-cup. Makes great coffee, tea and cocoa. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hodges

customer_reviews.title: My Second Keurig
customer_reviews.text: This is my Second Keurig. I wish it was available without the water filter, but that is a minor issue. I used filtered tap water anyway. I bought a refillable stainless-steel K-cup insert with which I brew bulk tea every morning. I love this Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love this brewing system
customer_reviews.text: I truly think my coffee tastes better;no, I know it does! I enjoy the convenience of having a cup of coffee,tea or hot chocolate whenever I want with no fuss. It is fast and doesn't make a lot of noise. Recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Damie Simons

customer_reviews.title: Time
customer_reviews.text: I love my keurig so far its great, I haven't had one problem yet, I say that b cuz like anything you have to have it a while in order to see if its durable, I say this b cuz of some of the last reviews I read, so I believe time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: mikeQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made in a long time. I love having fresh coffee with every cup. It's fun to have a choice of blends too. This model offers cup size options and temperature settings. It is well worth the extra money. Looks great on counter and really doesn't take up too much room. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: BH in CO

customer_reviews.title: This quickly be came a family favorite, everyone has their use
customer_reviews.text: This quickly be came a family favorite, everyone has their use, from drinks to hot water. So far we go thru a tank a day, it's very quiet and has been solid.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rempalski

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had amazing coffee until now.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn't want to spend so much money just for coffee. I purchased this for my husband's birthday and we are both believers now. We don't waste any coffee and we were previously throwing away 1/2 of our pots. The flavor is amazing, the machine is fast. Hope this machine lasts for years because we know it will get lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: sarahlee43

customer_reviews.title: better mornings
customer_reviews.text: we cant say enough good things about this coffee maker. super easy, makes fantastic tasting coffee and almost no cleanup required. perfect way to get you started in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. To bad it has been discontinued and I had to pay a small fortune for it. But all and all it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1978

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. She uses it multiple times a day, and we have not once had any issues with it. Definitely recommend this to the avid coffee and tea drinker that wants variety.
customer_reviews.author: casmith02

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and I was impressed with the quality and prompty delivery of item! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Very QUIET
customer_reviews.text: My old Keurig finally checked out after many years of service. It worked well but was very loud. I didn't mind the noise because the coffee tasted fine. This new machine makes coffee just as good, and does it quietly. I am very pleased - so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Ballerini

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product. Better than the newer models. I even use it to draw hot water out of to make jello.
customer_reviews.author: queenie

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker.... very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my wife, she put it on her Amazon Wish List (hint, hint). We enjoy the convenience and variety of coffees and other beverages available.
customer_reviews.author: Luther Willis

product_meta.title: Keurig K75 Single-Cup Home-Brewing System with Water Filter Kit, Platinum/Black
product_meta.description: The Platinum Brewing System is Keurig's best single-cup brewing system for your home. This premium model brews a perfect cup of coffee, tea, hot cocoa or iced beverage at the touch of a button. and offers discerning coffee drinkers the widest range of five cup size options for brewing. it offers the full spectrum of features including Auto On/Off, Digital Clock, Adjustable Temperature Control and the "Set Your Favorite Cup Size" (4 oz., 6 oz., 8 oz., 10 oz. and 12 oz. option). 72 oz. removable water reservoir holds up to ten cups before refilling and the removable drip tray allows for easy cleaning and the use of travel mugs. The sleek, award-winning design is a unique footprint among Keurig's line of home brewing systems and includes both a blue lit water reservoir and blue lit LCD display. At initial set up, once the machine is filled with water, it will take approximately 4-minutes for the water will be heated. During the heating period the red light next to HEATING on the LED Control Center will become illuminated. Once the water is heated, the red light will turn off and the Small Mug Button will flash. Press the Small Mug Button to start a cleansing brew. Pour the hot water into the sink. The Brewer may take 15 seconds to reheat water between brews during which time the red light next to HEATING on the LED Control Center may be illuminated. When the water has heated, the red light will turn off. The one-time set-up process is now complete and you are ready to brew.
feature_bullets: Single-cup home brewing system for use with patented K-Cups
One-touch control panel; blue backlit LCD display; digital clock; programmable on/off
5 brew-size options; adjustable brew temperature; removable drip tray
Blue-lit removable 72-ounce water reservoir; descale indicator; dishwasher-safe parts
Includes 12-count K-Cup variety pack and Water Filter Kit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars192 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
